title: @Riot Oh god. Please tell me this is ALSO a champion in the works!
body:
I mean, yeah, Ekko is cool and everything. But check out this other guy. I need you to look how fucking awesome he is and just... Embrace it for me.

http://i.imgur.com/V25mB37.png

http://i.imgur.com/hZpNm0m.png

http://i.imgur.com/ettyw9q.png

http://i.imgur.com/vcAZ3NA.png

http://i.imgur.com/BkILbZI.png

Think about it Riot. We could use another Zaun champion, and I'm sure you guys have no doubt noticed this guy is extremely popular. Who doesn't love a stimmed-out psycho berserker? Krieg (Borderlands 2) is a fan favorite for a reason. If you don't have something for this rude dude in the works, you might want to consider it...
